thread.section_title: toolani Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von toolani | toolani.com
thread.title: Linda Hermanspann

author: Linda Hermanspann
title: Linda Hermanspann
text: This app is very practical and easy to use. When I first created an account I got some free credits to make a test call, super helpful. Once I added more credit to my account I was able to quickly make phone calls to all my international friends by just dialling from my normal contact list and toolani would automatically offer to use the app to save money. The connection is always outstanding as the call goes through the mobile network and doesn't need an internet connection. The app itself is easy to navigate for checking your balance and call history. All in all a super useful app!
